title: Photostabilities and anti-tumor effects of curcumin and curcumin-loaded polydopamine nanoparticles
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13694-13702
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01246A, Paper

Shufeng Yan, Xiaoyun Liao, Qi Xiao, Qingqing Huang, Xiaochen Huang
In this study, the PDA-Cur NPs has been successfully synthesized and proved to be an anticancer agent with better photostability and increased utilization of curcumin in PDT.
